definitions.definition: Pertaining to, or having the form , nature , or habits of, a beast .
Similar to the nature of a beast; contrary to the nature and dignity of human beings .

examples: Stop being so beastly to her!

definitions.definition: Of computer hardware or motor vehicles etc.: ostentatiously powerful .

main_definition: Pertaining to, or having the form , nature , or habits of, a beast .
secondary_definitions: Similar to the nature of a beast; contrary to the nature and dignity of human beings .
( UK , dated ) Abominable ; very unpleasant ; hideous .
( slang ) Of computer hardware or motor vehicles etc.: ostentatiously powerful .
